itemInfo.itemDesc: Energy of agility is contained within this Taritas Armor\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Armor of Agility, Taritas Armor of Agility, Steel Taritas Armor, Taritas Armor

item.name: Taritas Armor
item.desc: Armor worn by tough warriors. Morale boosting proverbs are written inside the armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Armor

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
